name: @wences.com welcome to the IndieWeb! If you need help getting started, we have an awesome community chat you can access via Slack - https://chat.indieweb.org/

summary: Thank you Jonathan, I am struggling with some tech stuff … let’s see how far a non-tech CEO can go before begging for help 😀 In any case, I will land in the chat as I have some comments to place about the IndieWeb. Happy to connect!
